name: Ankou
description:
Ankou is a first person shooter game.

Is only available in windows 32bits and 64bits.

The game was made in Unity 3d, Blender 3d, Sweet Home 3d, Makehuman, Mixamo, GIMP, Paint.net and Audacity.

Controls

WASD+mouse
P to pause
R to reload weapon

How to play

The objective of the game is chatch objects in the office and return the point to start.

HighScore

The calculation of highscore have in mint the time, heath and enemy to kill.

Languages

Chinese, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese and Russian are translated with help of Google Translator.
